00020 //
00021 // To the LRM writer : this class is purely an artifact of the implementation.
00022 //
00023 
00024 #ifndef __CIRCULAR_BUFFER_H__
00025 #define __CIRCULAR_BUFFER_H__
00026 
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 
00029 namespace tlm {
00030 
00031 template < typename T >
00032 class circular_buffer
00033 {
00034 public:
00035 
00036   explicit
00037   circular_buffer( int size = 0 );
00038   ~circular_buffer();
00039 
00040   void resize( int size );
00041   void clear();
00042 
00043   T read();
00044   void write( const T & );
00045 
00046   bool is_empty() const { return used() == 0; }
00047   bool is_full() const { return free() == 0; }
00048 
00049   int size() const { return m_size; }
00050   int used() const { return m_used; }
00051   int free() const { return m_free; }
00052 
00053   const T& read_data() const
00054     { return buf_read( m_buf, m_ri ); }
00055 
00056   const T& peek_data( int i ) const
00057     { return buf_read( m_buf, (m_ri + i) % size() ); }
00058 
00059   T & poke_data( int i )
00060     { return buf_read( m_buf , (m_wi + i) % size() ); }
00061 
00062   void debug() const;
00063 
00064 private:
00065   void increment_write_pos( int i = 1 );
00066   void increment_read_pos( int i = 1 );
00067 
00068   void init();
00069 
00070   circular_buffer( const circular_buffer<T> &b );              // disabled
00071   circular_buffer<T> &operator=( const circular_buffer<T> & ); // disabled
00072 
00073   void* buf_alloc( int size );
00074   void  buf_free( void*& buf );
00075   void  buf_write( void* buf, int n, const T & t );
00076   T&    buf_read( void* buf, int n ) const;
00077   void  buf_clear( void* buf, int n );
00078 
00079 private:
00080   int    m_size;                   // size of the buffer
00081   void*  m_buf;                    // the buffer
00082   int    m_free;                   // number of free spaces
00083   int    m_used;                   // number of used spaces
00084   int    m_ri;                     // index of next read
00085   int    m_wi;                     // index of next write
00086 
00087 };
00088 
00089 template< typename T >
00090 void
00091 circular_buffer<T>::debug() const
00092 {
00093 
00094   std::cout << "Buffer debug" << std::endl;
00095   std::cout << "Size : " << size() << std::endl;
00096   std::cout << "Free/Used " << free() << "/" << used() << std::endl;
00097   std::cout << "Indices : r/w = " << m_ri << "/" << m_wi << std::endl;
00098 
00099   if( is_empty() ) {
00100 
00101     std::cout << "empty" << std::endl;
00102 
00103   }
00104 
00105   if( is_full() ) {
00106 
00107     std::cout << "full" << std::endl;
00108 
00109   }
00110 
00111   std::cout << "Data : " << std::endl;
00112   for( int i = 0; i < used(); i++ ) {
00113 
00114     std::cout << peek_data( i ) << std::endl;
00115 
00116   }
00117 
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00121 template < typename T >
00122 circular_buffer<T>::circular_buffer( int size )
00123   : m_size(size)
00124   , m_buf(0)
00125 {
00126   init();
00127 
00128 }
00129 
00130 template < typename T >
00131 void
00132 circular_buffer<T>::clear()
00133 {
00134   for( int i=0; i < used(); i++ ) {
00135     buf_clear( m_buf, (m_ri + i) % m_size );
00136   }
00137   m_free = m_size;
00138   m_used = m_ri = m_wi = 0;
00139 }
00140 
00141 template < typename T >
00142 circular_buffer<T>::~circular_buffer()
00143 {
00144   clear();
00145   buf_free( m_buf );
00146 }
00147 
00148 template < typename T >
00149 void
00150 circular_buffer<T>::resize( int size )
00151 {
00152 
00153   int i;
00154   void * new_buf = buf_alloc(size);
00155 
00156   for( i = 0; i < size && i < used(); i++ ) {
00157 
00158     buf_write( new_buf, i, peek_data( i ) );
00159     buf_clear( m_buf, (m_ri + i) % m_size );
00160 
00161   }
00162 
00163   buf_free( m_buf );
00164 
00165   m_size = size;
00166   m_ri   = 0;
00167   m_wi   = i % m_size;
00168   m_used = i;
00169   m_free = m_size - m_used;
00170 
00171   m_buf  = new_buf;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 template < typename T >
00176 void
00177 circular_buffer<T>::init() {
00178 
00179   if( m_size > 0 ) {
00180     m_buf = buf_alloc( m_size );
00181   }
00182 
00183   m_free = m_size;
00184   m_used = 0;
00185   m_ri = 0;
00186   m_wi = 0;
00187 
00188 }
00189 
00190 template < typename T >
00191 T
00192 circular_buffer<T>::read()
00193 {
00194   T t = read_data();
00195 
00196   buf_clear( m_buf, m_ri );
00197   increment_read_pos();
00198 
00199   return t;
00200 }
00201 
00202 template < typename T >
00203 void
00204 circular_buffer<T>::write( const T &t )
00205 {
00206   buf_write( m_buf, m_wi, t );
00207   increment_write_pos();
00208 }
00209 
00210 
00211 template < typename T >
00212 void
00213 circular_buffer<T>::increment_write_pos( int i ) {
00214 
00215   m_wi = ( m_wi + i ) % m_size;
00216   m_used += i;
00217   m_free -= i;
00218 
00219 }
00220 
00221 template < typename T >
00222 void
00223 circular_buffer<T>::increment_read_pos( int i ) {
00224 
00225   m_ri = ( m_ri + i ) % m_size;
00226   m_used -= i;
00227   m_free += i;
00228 
00229 }
00230 
00231 template < typename T >
00232 inline void*
00233 circular_buffer<T>::buf_alloc( int size )
00234     { return new unsigned char[ size * sizeof(T) ]; }
00235 
00236 template < typename T >
00237 inline void
00238 circular_buffer<T>::buf_free( void* & buf )
00239     { delete [] static_cast<unsigned char*>(buf); buf = 0; }
00240 
00241 template < typename T >
00242 inline void
00243 circular_buffer<T>::buf_write( void* buf, int n, const T & t )
00244 {
00245   T* p = static_cast<T*>(buf) + n;
00246   new (p) T(t);
00247 }
00248 
00249 template < typename T >
00250 inline T&
00251 circular_buffer<T>::buf_read( void* buf, int n ) const
00252 {
00253   T* p = static_cast<T*>(buf) + n;
00254   return *p;
00255 }
00256 
00257 template < typename T >
00258 inline void
00259 circular_buffer<T>::buf_clear( void* buf, int n )
00260 {
00261   T* p = static_cast<T*>(buf) + n;
00262   p->~T();
00263 }
00264 
00265 } // namespace tlm

00267 #endif
